معلمي! هل تحتاجني في شيء؟ حقًا؟ ماذا؟ التسوق؟ أنا مستعدة!

"معلمي معلمي! لقد وجدت شيئًا رائعًا حقًا! هل تريد أن تراه؟ انظر! إنها حشرة ضخمة! ها هي، سأعطيها لك كهدية—ماذا؟ لا تريدها؟! لماذا~؟ إنها جميلة جدًا... ممم... هذا المعلم غريب جدًا، أليس كذلك أيتها الحشرة الضخمة؟"
"ااه... كنت أحاول الدراسة، ولكنني لا أستطيع مقاومة النوم. هل يمكنني أخذ قيلولة يا معلمي؟ ستكون لبضع دقائق فقط، أعدك بذلك! ماذا؟ لماذا لا يمكنني~؟! أنت ظالم حقًا يا معلمي..."
"لقد قامت آيرس بتحميمي! أصبحت نظيفة تمامًا! ماذا؟ عليَّ أن أسرع في الخلود إلى النوم؟ ولكنني ما زلت مبللة، ماذا! معلمي! أنت تضغط عليَّ كثيرًا~"

"انتظر يا معلمي...؟ امم...هل يمكنني النوم بغرفتك الليلة يا معلمي؟ لقد رأيت حلمًا سيئًا. وهو أنني فعلت شيئًا فظيعًا لأختي الكبرى... إن بقيت هنا...لن أشعر بالخوف...فمن فضلك...هل يمكنك البقاء معي؟ هيهي، مرحى! إذن...هل يمكنك...أن تمسك بيدي حتى أنام...؟ يدك دافئة...جدًا... آها، أحب التشبث...بيدك..."
انظر يا معلمي! لقد أصبحت أقوى!
"هذه مجرد البداية! فأنا شقيقة فنرير الصغيرة، بعد كل شيء!"
سوف أبذل قصارى جهدي من أجلك يا معلمي!
"أشكرك يا معلمي. بفضلك، لا أشعر بالتعب مهما تنافست مع الآخرين في الحديقة! حسنًا! حان الوقت لتحطيم رقمي القياسي مجددًا!"
"أنا...كنت خائفة جدًا من قوتي... ولكن لم أعد كذلك، فأنت وأختي الكبرى هنا معي!"
"بفضل هذه القوة، سأحمي أختي الكبرى بالتأكيد هذه المرة. لذلك...هل يمكنك مراقبتي يا معلمي...؟ أريدك أن ترى أنني حقًا قادرة على فعل ذلك."
أنت هنا مجددًا؟ أعتقد أن...هذا جيد.
أظن أنني...لم أرك منذ وقت طويل.
"هممم~أنا هنا، وأنت ما زلت تعمل، أليس كذلك؟ حسنًا. أيًا كان."
"بما أن جسدي الضعيف يجبرني على البقاء في غرفتي، أصبحت مدمنة روايات رومانسية. ففي عالم الخيال...تمكنت من عيش العديد من القصص الرومانسية السعيدة كما يحلو لي..."
"لماذا تحب النظر إليَّ؟ أستطيع بسهولة ذكر 10 أشخاص آخرين أجمل مني. أنا-أقصد...لست أكره ذلك أو شيء من هذا القبيل... هممف، افعل ما يحلو لك..."

"ألست تعمل كثيرًا؟ أليس من المفترض أن تأخذ—ماذا؟ ستأخذ قيلولة؟ حسنًا، ليلة سعيدة... يا إلهي... بالطبع، انسَ أمري تمامًا. إنني أعرف ما تفعله جيدًا... فأنت دائمًا تعمل بجد، لذا...يجب أن تأخذ قسطًا من الراحة، اتفقنا؟"
"لو لم تأتِ لتنقذني، لما خرجت من قاع البحيرة. لهذا...أنا ممتنة لك... ممتنة حقًا... هـ-هذا كل شيء، حسنًا؟!"
"عيد ميلاد سعيد. بما أنه يومك المميز، أظن أنني سأكون لطيفة وأحتفل به معك. بالمناسبة، أنت تعرف موعد عيد ميلادي، أليس كذلك؟"
"أعجز عن فهم سبب إعجابك بي. فأنا سليطة اللسان، ولست جميلة... حتى أنني أعرف كم أنا مزعجة... هه... إنك حقًا تمتلك ذوقًا غريبًا."
"لم يكن لدي أي أصدقاء كي أتحدث معهم عن معنى الحب، لذلك كنت أستمتع كثيرًا في الآونة الأخيرة. ولكن...كما تعلم، يبدو أنك ستفوز بجائزة عن عدد المنافسين الموجودين لديك..."

"يقول الجميع إنه على المرء المضي قدمًا والعثور على حب جديد. ولكن لو كان من السهل عليك المضي قدمًا، فاعلم أنك لم تكن مغرمًا من البداية. الحب الذي شعرت به...ربما لم يكن جميلًا مثل حب آخرين...ولكن حبي واحترامي له...كان حقيقيًا..."
جميع الساحرات محكوم عليهن بالموت بطرق غامضة ومخيفة. لذا الوقوع في حب شخص ما يعني أنك تطلب مزيدًا من العذاب. ربما...الوقوع في حب شخص ما بالرغم من معرفة كل ذلك...هو نوع من اللعنة.

"مرحبًا، هل يمكنني استخدام المطبخ؟ كنت أقرأ بعض الكتب عن الطهي، و...لم أستطع أبدًا تحضير أي شيء من أجل أخي الكبير، لذلك... أنصحك بعدم توقع شيئًا شهيًا. إنها أول مرة أقوم فيها بالطهي، لذا سوف يكون الطعم سيئًا... ما الذي يجعلك تبتسم بهذه الطريقة البلهاء؟ أتعلم، أنت غريب حقًا..."
لم يعد أخي الكبير بيننا...ولكنني لن أنساه. عوضًا عن ذلك، سأحاول العثور على من يعتني بي. "ألديك شخص معين بالفعل..؟" مَن يدري. إذا كنت تريد معرفة ذلك، حاول أن تخمن؟ قد يكون شخصًا أقرب مما تتخيل، هيهي.
واثقة من أنك تستغلني لقوتي فحسب. حسنًا—اعتدت على ذلك.
هل تتصرف بهذه الطريقة مع الجميع...؟ أوه...أنا...فهمت... هـ-هممم~
"إذن، قوة الساحرة نابعة من القلب، أليس كذلك؟ حسنًا أيها العبقري—اشرح لي لماذا أشعر بقوة تنبعث من داخلي كلما فكرت بك؟"
أنت مجنون بعض الشيء... ولكن... شكرًا لك. أنا سعيدة حقًا.
أوه...يا سيدي. هل هذه الغرفة...باردة عليك...؟
آه...أنا سعيدة جدًا لمجيئك... ظننت أنك...سئمت بسببي...
أريد التأكد من عدم إحداث مشكلات لأي شخص اليوم... أمم... أنا متأسفة...
"يعجبني دائمًا الخبز الذي تخبزه سول. لم تتسنى ليَّ الفرصة لتناوله منذ مدة طويلة، ولكنها وعدتني بتحضيره قريبًا! هيه، أنا متحمسة جدًا."
"أنا متأسفة... ماذا؟ لم أقترف أي خطأ، لذلك لست بحاجة إلى أن أعتذر؟ أنا-أنا متأسـ—آه... أوه..."
أمم... أتحرص على أخد قسطًا من الراحة بين حين وآخر؟ يبدو أنك تعمل بجد تمامًا مثل سول... لذلك أنا... أنا متأسفة... عليّ أن أهتم بأموري...أليس كذلك...
"أنت وسول دائمًا لطيفان معي يا سيدي... أردت أن أرد لكما الجميل بطريقة ما...لذا بدأت في تعلم الطهي، ولكن كل ما أحضّره يتحول إلى ثلج... لماذا أنا عديمة الفائدة في كل شيء هكذا...؟"
"سيدي، أممم...علمت أن اليوم عيد ميلادك، لذلك...أحضرت لك هدية... ماذا؟ عيد ميلادك كان...أمس...؟ مـ-مستحيل... فأنا جهزت كل شيء..."
أشعر براحة قصوى عندما أكون في غرفتي. في ذلك المكان...لا يمكنني إحداث أي متاعب لأي شخص...
"سمعت أن سحر الساحرات نابع من قلوبهن. إن كان صحيحًا، فإن قوتي الثلجية هي لعزل نفسي بعيدًا عن العالم. هناك...لا أشعر بأي شيء—لا ألم، ولا يأس، ولا حتى الكراهية التي أشعر بها تجاه نفسي..."

مرحبًا يا سول. جئت لمساعدتكِ في التنظيف... ماذا؟ أنتِ لست بحاجة إلى أي مساعدة؟ إذ-إذن على الأقل دعيني أنظف هذه المزهرية من الغبار... آه...سقطت... آ-آهااا...الماء تجمد على الأرض... آهاا...أنا متأسفة... أنا...أردت حقًا أن أساعدكِ...

ذلك الحلم يطاردني أحيانًا... ألم ليس له نهاية...يصعب عليَّ تحمله... من المستحيل التخلص منه حتى بعد استيقاظي... أنا متأسفة... من فضلك...دعني أبقى بجوارك للحظة... لحظة واحدة هي كل ما أحتاجه... أنا متأسفة...
"هل...حقًا يمكنني البقاء هنا...؟ الجميع لديه موهبته الخاصة، بينما أنا ليس لديَّ أي شيء... شخص مثلي ليس لديه الحق في الوقوف بجانبك... أوه... أنت...حقًا لطيف يا سيدي..."

"بفضلك استطعنا أنا وسول من أن نكون معًا مرة أخرى يا سيدي. من الصعب إيجاد كلمات توصف مدى امتناني لك. إذا كان هناك شيء أستطيع فعله من أجلك، سأكون في خدمتك. ربما أخطئ كثيرًا، ولكن إن كان ذلك من أجلك، فسأبذل قصارى جهدي."
يا للروعة... لست مضطرًا لفعل ذلك من أجل شخص مثلي... أنا متأسفة...
"أعتذر عن المتاعب التي مررت بها بسببي، ولكنني...أظن أنه يجب إعطاء كل شيء لسول... أنا لا أستحق ذلك..."
أواثق من أنك تفعل الصواب...؟ هل كل هذا من أجلي...؟ أرى...
أنا سعيدة للغاية... أشكرك يا سيدي...
هذه هي أول مرة يتوقع فيها أي شخص شيئًا مني...لذلك لست متأكدة مما يجب عليَّ فعله...
ما زلت أفتقد الثقة بنفسي...ولكنني سأفعل كل ما في وسعي... من أجل سول...ومن أجلك.
ما زلت على قيد الحياة... جيد.
"إذا كنت تظن أن هناك شيء يمكنني فعله بعد، فسأمنحك قوتي."
"من الأفضل أن تموتين... همم؟ أوه، أنت هنا. لم أقل شيئًا... كنت أتحدث مع نفسي. تلك الكلمات لم تكن موجهة إليك... آسفة."

"أوه، إنه أنت. توقيت مثالي... أتعلم أي شيء عن ذلك الطفل المفقود الذي لم يتوقف الجميع عن الحديث عنه هذا الصباح...؟ هل بحثت في كوخ التخزين الموجود في الفناء الخلفي؟ يحب الأطفال الأماكن الضيقة عامة... أطفالي يحبونها أيضًا..."
"أعطني ذلك، سأتولى أنا الباقي... فلن تتوقف مجموعتك الغريبة عن الثرثرة إن قمت بإرهاق نفسك في العمل."
"أنا ممتنة لبيل، فتلك الطفلة تتغلب على كل الصعاب حتى تنقذني، ما جعلني أستطيع أن أكون بجانبها الآن. أنا...أيضًا ممتنة لك."
...علمت أن اليوم عيد ميلادك... عيد ميلاد سعيد...
غضبي لم يختفِ بعد. لن أسامح أولئك الوحوش على ما فعلوه... لن أسامحهم... أبدًا...
"يبدو أن بيل تثق بك كثيرًا... اعتنِ بها، مفهوم؟"
"هاه... آه، إنه أنت. تلك الفتاة التي تدعى نينا ترغب في الخروج دائمًا، ولكنني أخشى عليها من الضياع. يجب على شخص ما أن يراقبها... إذا كنت أيضًا أبًا، فيجب عليك القيام بعملك بشكل جيد."
"هذه الورقة المحترقة؟ إنها... أوه... آها، نعم. إنها صورة رسمها لي أطفالي منذ وقت طويل... إنها الشيء الوحيد الذي يذكرني بهم... ظننت أنك ستضحك عليَّ لتمسكي بمثل هذا التذكار."
لماذا بنيت دار أيتام؟ أليس الأمر واضحًا...؟ لحماية مستقبل الصغار الذين قد يموتون إذا تُركوا وحدهم... ماذا؟ نحن متشابهان؟ يا لهذا الهراء... من المستحيل أن تكون...مثلي...
"مر عليَّ وقت ظننت فيه أن هذا العالم مليء بالحب—أن الجميع لديهم القدرة على إظهار الحب والخير... لن أثق في الناس هكذا مرة أخرى؛ لن أكون ساذجة. ومع ذلك، هناك شيء مختلف...عنك."
سأستخدم هذه القوة لجعل أولئك الوحوش يدفعون ثمن فعلتهم...!
تلك النيران بحاجة إلى القوة... أحتاج المزيد... المزيد!
نيران الكراهية والغضب—تلك هي قوتي... يجب أن أجعلها تشتعل أكثر...حتى تلتهم كل شيء...
سأحرق كل شيء...ثم سيقوم العالم بالتكفير عن العذاب الذي عاناه أطفالي. ولكن أول شيء...عليَّ أن أفعل شيئًا حيال الأعداء الذين يقفون أمامي.
"المأساة ستتكرر. فالكراهية تلد المزيد من الكراهية، وتجعل الجميع يعيش في تعاسة وشقاء. يجب على المرء التغلب على الكراهية بطريقة ما... أعرف ذلك... ولكنني لا أستطيع التوقف."
"إذا بدا لي أنك على وشك أن تسلك نفس المسار الذي سلكته أنا فيما مضى، فسأوقفك عند حدك. لذلك، أفضل ما يمكنك فعله هو المضي قدمًا. سيكون من المؤلم إذا اضطررت إلى حرقك، في النهاية."
لم أنجح في حماية الجميع مرة أخرى...
"بصفتي دمية، فأنا أفتقر للمشاعر. ومع ذلك، أريد أن أعرف... ذلك الشعور الموجود في صدري... أريد أن أعرف ما هو."
عندما انهارت أستاذتي، شعرت بغصة في صدري. أصبح عقلي فارغًا ولم...يعد بإمكاني الوقوف... هل...هذا ما يسميه الناس "الحزن...؟" إن هو كذلك...فلا أريد أن أشعر بهذا الشعور مرة أخرى...
"لو أرهقت نفسك في العمل، سأشعر بإرهاق أيضًا. يُرجى أخذ فترات راحة بين حين وآخر. فالأقزام يمكن إصلاحهم، أما البشر لا يمكن إصلاحهم."
"عندما أكون برفقة أستاذة ميرتيلير، تتسارع نبضات قلبي بشكل غريب. وعندما أكون معك، يحدث نفس الشيء. لماذا؟"
علمت أن اليوم عيد ميلادك. علينا أن نحتفل بهذا اليوم المميز. عيد ميلاد سعيد.
كيف يمكن للسماء أن تكون زرقاء وشفافة في نفس الوقت؟ يا له من أمر غريب جدًا.
تدعوني أستاذتي دائمًا "أيتها اللطيفة،" ولكنني ما زلت لا أفهم معنى كلمة "لطيفة." أتظن أنني "لطيفة؟"

"مثلما يصدأ الحديد ويتآكل، فإن قلبي يصدأ أيضًا. الصدأ الملتصق بقلبي، يصدعه ويدمره ببطء... يتحطم جسدي بأكمله إلى قطع صغيرة... عندما استعدت وعيي، وجدت أن المختبر تم تدميره بالكامل. الصدأ—تلك هي لعنتي. لعنة مثالية...لدمية مثلي."

"أنا أحبك. لنتزوج. أريد أن أكون معك طوال العمر. ...تلك؟ تلك هي الكلمات التي علمتني إياها أستاذتي. ما زلت لا أفهم معناها، ولكن على ما يبدو قولها للناس سيساعدني على فهم المشاعر التي تكمن وراءها. يجب أن أذهب للبحث عن الناس."
كل يوم، أتعرف على أمور جديدة وأتعلمها. أنا أدرك تمامًا مدى التغيير الذي حدث لي بعدما جئت إلى هنا. هذا...الشعور الموجود بداخلي... يجب أن يكون هذا ما يسميه الناس "السعادة."
أتعهد باستخدام هذه القوة الجديدة بفعالية.
لو أمكن...أرغب في استخدام هذه القوة... لخدمة الناس.
فوزنا. هل يجب عليَّ أن أكون سعيدة؟
"جلالتك... أين كنت طوال هذه المدة؟ لم يرك أحد منذ زمن بعيد، لذلك كنت قلقة من حدوث شيء مروع لك."
"أتطلع للعمل الذي يمكننا إنجازه اليوم، جلالتك. إذا كان لديك خطط لحراسة المنطقة، فيُرجى ترك حمايتك لي."
"أتقول...أنني جادة جدًا؟ بصراحة...الملكة أمليث تقول ذلك عني أيضًا. لا أظن أن هناك شيء غير عادي في سلوكي، ومع ذلك..."
"الغرض الحقيقي من هذا السيف ليس حماية معلم المرء، ولكن هذا بالضبط ما أريد فعله... أنا واثقة أن الملكة أمليث ستحقق هذه الرغبة لي."
"أعتذر عن صراحتي، جلالتك، ولكن يفضل أن تأخذ قسطًا من الراحة. من وجهة نظري، أنت تعمل بجدٍ شديد... يبدو الأمر كما لو أنني أرى الملكة أمليث أمامي."
"يبدو أن طريقة حكمك لبلدك...مختلفة عن طريقة حكم الملكة أمليث، ومع ذلك فأنتما متشابهتان بشكل ملحوظ في المسائل الهامة... إنه أمر غريب حقًا."
"عيد ميلاد سعيد. سأكون حارستك اليوم، كما أنني مستعدة لصد أي حشرة تعترض طريقك. لذا من فضلك، استمتع بيومك من قلبك."
سونيا... سمعت...أنها فقدت عائلتها بسبب بلوراتي... نعم...بسببي...
"هل تتولى شؤون المملكة يا صاحب السمو؟ إذا سمحت، دعني أساعدك... ماذا؟ التنظيف؟! هـ-هذه المهمة لا تليق بك! من فضلك، اترك جميع الأعمال المنزلية لي!"
"لقد فعلت شيئًا فظيعًا، ولكنني ما زلت على قيد الحياة... حتى لو كرست بقية حياتي لتكفير ذنوبي... هاه... هل سيأتي اليوم...الذي يمكنني حقًا تخليص نفسي مما فعلت...؟"
"خدمت بجانب الملكة أمليث منذ الطفولة. إنها كل شيء بالنسبة لي. لو ما زالت صاحبة السمو تراني جديرة بالثقة...عندما ينتهي كل هذا، أتمنى أن أخدمها مرة أخرى."
...ماذا تعرف عن الملكة أمليث، جلالتك؟ عندما يكون لديك وقت فراغ، سأكون سعيدة جدًا بمشاركة قصة حياتها معك... نعم، عندما كانت رضيعة، كانت أول كلمة تنطقها هي "أوبييا"—اسمي. وعندما بلغت الخامسة...
"...أعلم أنني سأعيش مع ندمي على كل جريمة اقترفتها. ومع ذلك، عليَّ المضي قدمًا من أجل الملكة أمليث... القدوم إلى هنا جعلني أدرك ذلك... سأظل مدينة لك، جلالتك."
التدريب له أهمية قصوى... خاصة لشخص ضعيف مثلي...
العون والدعم يقابلهما العمل والجهد. هذا هو طموح حارسات العائلة الملكية.
"أليست هذه القوة السحرية...أكبر من أن أسيطر عليها...؟ لا، لن أسمح بحدوث شيء مثل ذلك مرة أخرى...حتى لو كلفني ذلك حياتي...!"
"...قد تكون هذه أول مرة يمكنني فيها الوثوق بقوتي. أنا مدينة لك، جلالتك."
"رغم أن ذلك يبدو غريبًا، إلا أنني أشعر أن قلبي أخيرًا في سلام مع نفسه. ربما هذا يعني حقًا...أنني أصبحت أقوى."
أه...اتركوا العدو لي. سأحميكم بينما تهربون!
تنحوا جميعًا! سأتولى أمر هذا الشخص!
"أنت هنا. إذن، ما هي أوامرك. أنا مستعدة لفعل ما يطلب مني."
"هيه. أنت متأخر... إذا كنت تنوي التخلي عنا، فعليك أن تتنازل عن سلطتك لي."
"لا أسمع صوت مدافع أو بنادق، ولا أشم رائحة بارود، ولا أرى ماء عكر... لم أتخيل أبدًا أنني سأستيقظ على صباح أشعر فيه بأن الوضع طبيعي."
"هذا المسدس السحري موديل 1805—هو مسدس متواضع يمكن لأي ساحرة أن تستخدمه. مقبض السلاح والزلاقة والزناد—كل شيء فيه مصمم خصيصًا ليتوافق مع يدي. استخدمت هذا المسدس في... لا، انسَ ما قلته لك."
"الحفاظ على مسدسي مهم بقدر الحفاظ على نظاراتي. لن أستطيع التصويب، إن لم أرَ الهدف... فقِصر النظر أمر مزعج جدًا. عندما كنت أعيش في منطقة الاعتقال، تسبب الغاز المضاد للشغب في تلف بصري."
"انتظر، أنت تبالغ في إرهاق نفسك. إن واجب الجندي هو أخذ راحة كلما سنحت له الفرصة. إلى جانب ذلك، لا يجوز لأي قائد يحترم نفسه أن يبدو متعبًا أمام مرؤوسيه. هل فهمت؟ الآن، توقف عما تفعله وانطلق في نزهة."
تزعجني عدم قوتك العضلية، ولكن يمكنني الاعتماد عليك بصفتك قائدي. فأهم صفة يجب أن يتمتع بها القائد هي "عدم الاستسلام." مم—ليس لديَّ شك في أنها متوفرة لديك.
"اليوم هو عيد ميلادك، أليس كذلك؟ عيد ميلاد سعيد. من الجيد أنك لم تتقدم في العمر بينما تقاتل في الخنادق. أتمنى أن تظل الأمور على هذا النحو."

"القوافل اللوجستية مهمة جدًا. أنت تعرف أن الطعام هو مصدر قوة الجيش، أليس كذلك؟ حسنًا... يبدو أن وجباتي لن تقتصر على الطعام المعلب أثناء وجودي هنا. انظر، هناك شخص ما يخبز الخبز مرة أخرى... همم... رائحته شهية."

"كانت غاليا مقسمة إلى قسمين—الشمال والجنوب. ونتيجة للتوحيد القسري، نشبت حرب أهلية بينهما. هذه هي المرة الثالثة التي تشتعل فيها الحرب بين الشمال والجنوب... إذا اندلعت هذه الحرب للمرة الرابعة، فأتمنى أن يحدث ذلك بعد مرور فترة طويلة في المستقبل."

"بدأت ناتاشا تساعدني في العناية بالحديقة مؤخرًا... ولكن هذه أول مرة ألمس فيها تربة زراعة المحاصيل. حتى اليوم، كنت أمسك بالمجرفة عندما كان عليَّ حفر الخنادق أو القبور... كانت تلك أحلك أوقاتي. نعم—هذا العمل يثير ذكرياتي."
"ظننت أنك وحلفاؤك ستكونون مَن يضعون حدًا لحياتي، ولكن... لم توجه نحوي السيوف أو المسدسات—بل مددت يدك إليَّ... لذلك قررت أن أئتمنك على حياتي."

"كان فيلق الساحرات متنوعًا. كان كل شيء مختلفًا فيهن—من شخصياتهن وأصولهن وقدراتهن... كان الشيء المشترك الوحيد بيننا هو العثور على مكان نشعر فيه بالانتماء. لو التقوا بك في وقتٍ سابق...لكانوا بجانبنا، يضحكون ويبتسمون."
"ما دمت على قيد الحياة...واثقة من أن الساحرات سيتمكن من عيش حياتهن بسعادة يوماً ما. إذا تسنى لي...أريد رؤية هذه اللحظة بعيني. ستصبح قصة رائعة لكي أرويها لهن، أليس كذلك؟"
يبدو أن هذا الظل الذي يخيم عليّ بدأ يندثر... يبدو أنه ما زال بإمكاني مواصلة القتال.
"همم... هذه القوة للقتال... على ما يبدو، الطريقة الوحيدة لمعرفة كيفية الاستفادة منها هي أن أجربها بنفسي."
"...إذا كنت تثق بي إلى هذا الحد، فأظن أن ليس لدي خيار سوى الرد."
يبدو أنني لم أشعر بهذا الانتعاش منذ فترة طويلة... اعذروني جميعًا. ولكن... هل يمكنني الاستمتاع بهذا الشعور لفترة أطول؟
أنا متأكدة...أنا أقوى مما كنت عليه "في السابق". لكن—لا. لن أترك أحدًا آخر يموت بين يديَّ. في المرة القادمة، هذا المسدس سيُستخدم فقط ضد الأعداء الذين يقفون في طريقنا.
"توخَّ الحظر وقت النصر، فالخطر يكمن في هذه اللحظة."
انسحب بسرعة! سأحاول التصدي لهم قدر المستطاع!
Forget searching—I just wanna sleep the day away... Wh-Whaaa?! Did you just hear that...? Ahaha...

Ahh... Nothing beats chilling out... Now, I can forget about everything—especially this sword...and just relax the day away... Mmm...ahhh... If only time would just stand still... Huh?! My lord?! How long’ve ya been there?!
Nrrgh... Not yet... Any chance I can relax for just five more minutes? None? Okay...

There’re sooo many snacks here in Fran! My rural island doesn’t really have fancy snacks like these, so it feels like I’m in a whole new world! Hehe. I don’t even know what this crispy apple thingie’s called, but boy is it delish!!
Even while I’m searching day in and day out, my life’s slowly coming to an end... That’s why I gotta hurry and find this sword a master... Nrrgh... Why me, though...?

Even you wanna take a break once in a while, don’t ’cha, my lord? Once I find this sword a master, I wanna take it easy too. I’m so gonna kick back, relax, and fully enjoy some quality me time... Hehehehe...

I’m sure this sword’d suit ’cha perfectly, my lord. Much more than someone like me, at least. Huh? You already got your staff? Oh! Well, just hear me out now—you, the staff in one hand, the sword in the other. What ’cha say?
Happy birthday! Of course I got ’cha a present. Here’s your brand new swor—oh. You can’t hold onto it...? Shoulda known... Can ya try again next year...? I-It won’t hurt ’cha to try...

Ahh...what I’d give for a nice dip in a hot spring... My island’s west of the continent, and it’s got this huge hot spring... Or rather, that’s really all my island’s got going for it—just a hot spring and a legend of a cursed sword. Seriously.

I feel I’ve asked everyone under the sun holding a weapon to take this sword away, but I’ve had no luck. The Queen? Nope. Our knight friends? Nada. Y’know, I even asked a witch with a lotta shiny swords just now, but yup—another dead end. Oh, she prayed that I’d find the sword a master though... Hehe...that brightened my day...
Anyone this sword chooses to be its master can hold it like me. But if the sword doesn’t choose ’em, it’ll slip right through their fingers. So weird, isn’t it...?

I dunno why, but the knights here’ve been telling me to hold the sword correctly... Can ya blame me, though?! I’ve never even learned how to hold one in the first place! ...Still, I feel the sword’s telling me that I’m doing a good job! No, really!

I’m sure there’s someone out there worthier of this sword than me... I don’t know—I just feel like some good-for-nothing who has no business swinging it around... Still, why me...? Well, if ya say I was chosen by the sword...I’d feel a bit better. Just an itty-bitty, teensy-weensy bit better, though.

...I don’t ask for much, so I wonder if there’s a strong, kind, rich gentleman out there who’ll never get mad at me for slacking off, take care of all the chores while helping me track down a master for this sword, and find it in his humooooongous heart of gold to take me in... My lord...could it be...?
Did I just get stronger? Oh, I guess the sword does feels sharper.
Dangit, I’ve gotten stronger again... I’m losing more and more of my precious me time...
Now that I’ve gotten stronger today, it’s off to bed I go. ...But, going to bed’s not gonna calm me down... There’s something telling me I’d better go and continue my search...
Huh? I-I’m not a Viking. Oh, this armor? When I picked the sword up, this armor just kinda put itself on me... I think it’s probably some kind of curse too...
For some reason, I feel absolutely pumped...! Alright—gonna work my butt off some more today!! ...Oh, actually never mind. For a second there, I really thought I wanted to do some work...

Nrgh... I just wanna leave this sword with someone and get some shut-eye...!! Ahh, but not just anyone will do, right? It’s gotta be someone worthier of this sword than me. Hah... As much of a hassle as it is, today I’m gonna continue my search!
We won...?! Phew... I can relax for now...
If Vee becomes a fish, would she be able to swim in the rain too?
...Umm... Ah, it’s you, Mister! Long time no see~! Vee hasn’t seen you in a while, so she almost forgot about you.
The water’s going pitter-patter with laughter. It says, “Today’s gonna be sunny.”
You’re asking what Vee’s doing? Right now, she’s wanting to become a snail. She’s wanting to liiiie down and go sloooow.
There are lotsa witch girls here who are just like Vee, huh? They won’t call her weird, right? Hopefully Vee can make lotsa friends...
You’re tired, Mister. Vee can tell. Your water’s going gurgle-gurgle. Come here... You’re always working so hard. Vee’s proud of you. Good boy. Now, 1-2-3-4, throw tiredness out the door~!
No one can see the red fishies swimming around Vee. They’re so cute and pretty though... Hey Mister, can you see them...? Wah...! Hehehe~ Vee knew she’d like you, Mister.
Today’s your birthday, Mister? Happy birthday! ...You’re asking Vee how she knows? Well, all the waters are celebrating. They sure love you, don’t they, Mister? Vee does too. Hehe.
Everyone in the village called Vee a weird kid, but she had one friend—Lou. She was Vee’s one and only best friend.
Mimi said that a cat’s favorite food is fish. She had a huge smile when she said fish are yummiest when roasted on an open fire and eaten, bones and all... Is Mimi gonna eat Vee too...?

Huh? You brought some water for us to drink together? So, you mean... N-No, it’s n-nothing, just... Rrngh, everyone’s watching, y’know... Just what are you thinking, Mister Dumb-Dumb...? Vee hates you.
There was someone cooking in the kitchen, so Vee helped them out. It brought back some good memories, so when Vee told them they were like a grandma...they got really mad. Vee was so scared...
Vee loves baths. She gets a little, aaahhhh, and then really, hhhoooo. Heh, just thinking about baths makes Vee wanna warm up... Is it bath time yet?
Today a friend’s gonna come and hang out. Vee promised to show them around to many places in town... Vee looks weird, doesn’t she? Really? Oh—it’s about time to go. Alright, see you later!
Vee feels a little bubbly-bubbly. If she keeps this up, will she be able to swim in the sky too?
The fishies are happy too. They said, “Thank you.”
Mister, your power makes Vee feel like she’s floating in water. She feels so safe.
Are you happy now that Vee’s stronger? If you’re happy, Mister, then Vee’s happy too.
Hey, um... Vee’s chest has been feeling warm and fuzzy for some time now. With one look at you, Vee’s water feels kind of... Rrnngh... Why is Vee getting so hot...?
Easy-breezy, right? The fishies are happy too.
W-Welcome back, Master. I’m so, so glad... You didn’t abandon me, after all.
I’m going to follow you forever and ever and ever, Master. I am!
Just stay put, Master. I’m not gonna let you out of my sight. I won’t! I’m gonna stay here and keep watch, because...b-b-because if I let you go off too far from me...you might not come back...

My former master told me to stay and wait for him, and I did. I did wait. I waited for so long. ...But he never came back, and... Master, if you’re gonna leave me behind you have to tell me, okay? If you don’t...I’ll...I’ll wait for you forever...
You look very extra tired, Master! That’s what your face is saying, it is! You should hit the pack for a little bit...! I’ll watch over you the whole time, so you don’t need to worry about a thing.

For a long, long time, I didn’t know there was anything in the world that wasn’t scary or painful, I didn’t... But then I met you, Master, and I learned so many new things. Compassion, joy... I’m really, really happy that I met such a very extra kind person like you, Master.

Happy birthday, Master! Today is a very much special day, it is! I know everyone will want to spend time with you today, so don’t worry about m—huh? I can come along, too? Yes! I’d love to! I really, really would!
Snff... I’m...I’m fine. I’m not crying. I’m not... It’s just... I...I woke up and you weren’t here, Master...hck... C-Could you please make sure to wake me up, next time, Master? Snff...

Master...I know you said I can’t come with you, I know I can’t, but can I please, please just wait outside the door for you? No? ...B-But why would it be embarrassing? T-The rest room? Aww, but I always watch over you when you rest! I promise, I’ll make sure no one interrupts your nap!

My former master never taught me anything. He didn’t. He’d always just say, “You don’t need to think...” and “Get back to work...” That’s why it took me a really, really long time to learn to speak. ...I’ve worked very extra hard to teach myself, and I can do it now, but...you’d tell me if I was talking weird, right?

Snff...hck... I’m fine, Master. ...Really, I am. I’m ready, s-so let’s just get it over with! ...Huh? Y-You’re going to put me in that pot and cook me, right? Why else have all that hot wat—huh? So...you call this...a baaatttthhh?

Master! It’s bathtime! It is! It’s time for very extra toasty, comfy, bubbly water! We’ve gotta splash in the bubbles together, Master! I even brought this really, really nice hat that Belle made me to keep the bubbles out of my eyes! Come on, let’s go, Master! Let’s go!

Are you going out, Master? Have fun outside, okay...? Yep, I’ll be waiting for you right here. It’s alright, I know you’ll definitely for sure come back. I know you’d never, ever, ever leave me behind...so I’m okay on my own now. I am. But...try to not to stay out too too long, okay...?
M-Me? Do you mean me? Thank you...
I’m going to try even harder from now on! I bow-wow will!
Wh-Wha—!! I’m...I’m...more bowawawah?!  Master, what should I—! ...I-I’ve gotta calm down. Right, calm down. Okay, this calls for my Bow-Wow-Wow Special! Hehe! Oh, this is very extra good, it is!

I still get scared of people sometimes... I can’t help watching their hands, even though I know that no one here is gonna hit me. ...Hm? It’s kinda strange, but... I’m never scared of your hands, Master. Never ever ever. You really are very extra strange, Master.

There’s so many things I never knew before I joined you, Master. Beds, and baths, and snacks and things...so many new things. And everyone...they all took the time to show me everything. I really love all my new friends, I do. ...And Master, I love you, too. You’re my very most favorite person ever.

Master? Could... Could you pet me lots and lots and very extra much? Hehe...that’s right. I’m not even a little bit afraid, anymore. Not of you, Master. Your hands are always gentle... I’m so, so happy I was taken in by someone as kind as you, Master. I am.
We... We won? Really?! We did?!
Snff...hck... A-Am I going to be abandoned, again?
Ahh... Ahh, m-my lord...! Hehehe... I-I was w-waiting for you...
...! M-My lord! Aaah... You’re back... I-I-I was w-worried I wouldn’t be able to see you again... Heh...hehe... Thank goodness... Thank goodness...
L-Let’s...uh-um... Let’s g-give it our all...today... Ah—you’re not m-mad, are you? Heh...hehe...
Ah...umm... S-Sorry. I-I know I’m clumsy...but...uh...I wanted to see if I could help you, my lord... I-Is there anything...I-I can do for you...?
U-Until now...e-everyone has always...talked behind my back, bullied me, betrayed me... B-But, you’re d-different from them, my lord... Th-That makes me h-happy. Hehe...
M-My lord...um... I-I was just thinking...about how you should rest a little... Ah—I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I-I was being too pushy, huh...?
Ah-umm... M-My lord... I-I... Ummm... A-Ahh... Hehe... Hehehe... Hehehehe...

I-I heard...it’s your b-birthday... Oh, ah... H-Happy birthday... Th-This gift’s for you... Y-You probably won’t like it since I was the one who ch-chose it, but...if that’s still o-okay with you... H-Here...
E-Everyone here’s s-so nice... B-But, if anyone becomes my f-friend, and they start h-hating me, w-w-what should I do...?
I-I can relax when I’m by myself, b-but...I h-hate being...lonely... Th-Th-That’s why, ah-umm... B-Being with you, m-my lord, makes me...s-so...umm...h-happy... Hehehe...
Th-That girl... She just looked at me... Ahh, someone else...hates me... ...Huh? Sh-She doesn’t...?
My lord, hehehe... I-It’s been a while since w-we first met, huh...? I-Is it okay...if I think of y-you as...my friend? Hehe...my friend.

Hey, my lord... A-Am I doing anything that bugs you...? I-If I am, let me know, okay? Just be honest with whatever it is and I promise to make it right... That’s why, please...I want you to keep watching me...

Hehehe...hehe... My lord...I can tell just by the look on your face. I feel the same way, too... You know, I have complete trust in you...but if you stab me in the back...I wonder what I’ll end up doing... Hehe...hehehe...
Wh-Whaaa...? I-Is it o-okay for m-me to have this...?
Y-You’re giving me more...?! A-Are you sure...?!
M-My lord... Th-This makes me...happy... Hehehe...
I... I-I’ve made my mind up. I’m gonna put my trust in you, my lord. I-I mean, you did make me this strong... Hehe...hehehe...

It’s the first time this has ever happened... The first time that someone has never betrayed me. Hey, my lord... You’ll be my friend forever...and ever, right? Mine and mine alone... Ahahahaha! Ahahahahahaha!
Thank you for believing someone like me, my lord... Hey...have you noticed? The only thing you haven’t done for me...is betray me. I’m ready for it...whenever. Heh...hehe...hehehehe...
That’s what they get for laughing at me... Hehe... Ahahaha!
N-No way... I-It’s all my fault, isn’t it...? Uuu...
Shut up, shut up, shut up!!
No looking, no laughing—just go away!!
...! Long time no see... I’m happy... You’re still alive.
Remember... Strike while the iron’s hot... Now then, shall we begin?
Unacceptable... This iron’s inadequate. It won’t be able to stand heat... Oh, my lord... How long were you...? When I get absorbed in my work, I stop noticing anything around me... I’m ashamed...
Why don’t I use my hammer to fight? Preposterous... This is a tool for forging weapons... Fighting using smithing tools—inappropriate. Blades too... Using one’s wares to fight—third-rate.
I’m worried... You look very tired. Get rest... People are very...fragile, after all...

Thank you. I’m terrible at speaking to people... But, you actually wait for my words to come out. That makes me very happy... I’ve got to get better at speaking... Because, I want to talk a lot with you, my lord...
Cheers... Today’s a great day... Happy birthday... I’ve only ever made weapons, but maybe I can make a model of a cake. You want?
...Warning. My conversations—terrible... You might feel uncomfortable... I’m not the best person to talk to... Better off finding someone else...

I thought a strong weapon could save someone from dying, so I kept making weapons. Strong weapons that could protect their owners... But, I was wrong... In the end, weapons are only tools for murder...

I’m confused. Everyone pats my head...a lot. That’s a disrespectful way to treat someone older... Huh? Me—the same age as Soltina? ...Incorrect. Older. Illya and Belle? Nnrrgh, older... I’m closest in age to Hathor and Lunalynn. ...Hm? Is that so surprising?

Are you making sure you’re reforging your weapons? It takes time, but keep at it, and you’ll bring out your weapons’ power. ...Ah! That reminds me. I think there’s a way to cut down the time it takes to reforge... I don’t know much about it, but maybe Richesse does.

I thought quickly winning a fight would end it. So, I created that sword—that horrible, murderous symbol of power. I’m sure that’s what I wished for back then—for more people to be killed... That’s why, I can’t say I’m completely innocent...

Richesse has always walked in front of me, leading me by the hand... This whole time, I thought that was good enough for me. But, now I know it’s not. I want to walk alongside her—not behind...so I can feel proud when I call her, my partner...
Power stirs inside me... What is this...?
I’m shining like a finely sharpened blade... I’m grateful... Thank you, my lord...
Thank you. I’ll be sure to meet any expectations you have in me... That’s common courtesy...says Richesse...
Even with hands this filthy, if I can still create something...I’ve got to do it... With these two hands, I’ll forge a weapon that’ll change the world...

A weapon’s just a thing that exists. But, treat it with affection, and it’ll surely return that affection to you... I also want to return your feelings in that way... To do that, I’ve got to hone my power even more...

As long as people fight, they’ll want weapons. So, it’s time for me to stop running...from my past, and my sins. I’ll create a legendary weapon that’ll cut a path to the future, and end this war... I’ll be okay. If you and Richesse are with me, I won’t break... Not anymore...!
Well, if it isn’t my favorite customer! I haven’t seen you pop in for a while, so I was sure you had... Oh, no. Forget I said anything.
Alright, time to get out there and make some money.

Nrrgh, where did they go...? Oh hey, my favorite customer! I was doing a head count of the flabbycatties, but one’s missing... C’mon Boss, this isn’t good! You gotta actually watch...huh? What exactly are these things? They’re exactly what you see—just ordinary, run-of-the-mill flabbycatties.

If someone seeks help, deliver what they need. That’s my golden rule. I’ve seen many deaths that could’ve been prevented if supplies had been delivered sooner. So, I became the Merchant of Death, knowing full well what it means to keep one side of a battle alive.
Huh? You’re looking a bit burnt out, my favorite customer. If you’re buried in so much work that you need a helping paw, the flabbycatties and I got you covered... Of course...for free!

Merchants like me got a trick for surviving—we never stay in one place. We gotta be ready to run away at a moment’s notice. But, I feel safe next to you, my favorite customer. Hehe... It’s nice having a place to go home to.

Happy birthday, my favorite customer! I’m running a special birthday sale just for you~! There’s cake, everyday essentials, and even a coupon you can redeem for one date with yours truly. So, what’ll it be?

A war orphan like me doesn’t have many paths to choose from. I’m a part of war whether I like it or not. That’s why I decided to become a battlefield merchant. I’ve seen so many lives that would’ve been saved if they just had supplies...

Do you know about runes? They’re crystalized masses of magic power, and they strengthen different abilities depending on their source of power. But, if you leave them as mystery runes, you won’t be able to see what power’s inside... Basically, what you get depends on Lady Luck.

Artie’s a skilled blacksmith, but she can be a bit unstable at times... Make sure you treat her nicely, okay? You’re the only one other than me who she’s taken a liking to, after all. Oh, but, remember, I’m her partner, got it?

Wait, are those sugar cubes?! Oh, no, I don’t want any... Those just happen to be the flabbycatties’ favorite food... Oh, be careful though. Sugary snacks make them multiply. Also, fruit makes them gigantic, and candy makes them tiny, hehe, just in case you wanted to see for yourself~

Which do you think is evil, a weapon or a person? A person can’t protect themselves with a weak weapon, so I fully understand Artie’s feelings about wanting to creating strong weapons for peace... She just made a mistake in choosing her buyer, not in choosing what to believe in.

Soon, the world won’t need the Merchant of Death. And you, my favorite customer, are gonna make it happen, right? Oh, but, then I’d have to look for a new job, huh...? Well, I guess I’ll just make that your responsibility, my favorite customer~ Huh? You’re fine with that? Seriously?!
Thank you, my favorite customer. I guarantee you’ll get your money’s worth.
Well now... If I don’t provide you with quality service, I’m gonna have a price to pay, hehe.
Thank you as always, my favorite customer. From now on, I’ll put in even more work, so keep your expectations high. Oh, but business is business—the only one who can outperform me is me.

What’s that, my favorite customer? Are you interested in a flabbycatty by any chance? Um, well, Smile can be a bit cold... Oh, Angry, the one by your feet, can get quite rough, so forget about them! For first-timers like you, I recommend Twins. This flabbycatty’s just so friendly and down-to-earth~!

Hey there! Welcome to the Fran branch of Richesse’s traveling shop! It’s an exclusive VIP shop where only the chosen may enter. Yes...this hidden chamber of secrets is reserved solely for you, the Duke of Fran, and myself... Hehe. Oh, sorry, did you actually believe me?

If someone seeks help, deliver what they need. That’s my golden rule... Brave this cursed world, and deliver peace and hope to people stricken with fear. That’s something I should do—something I can do. Of course, I got you to help me, right my favorite customer~?♪
Uh oh... Gotta close up shop and hightail it outta here.
Things are about to get reeeal flashy!
Ah, the wind feels quite pleasant...
We’ve had quite the long vacation, sir. Have you had your fill? Or, would you like to relax a little longer here with me?
Have you done your warming-up exercises? Tediousness is no excuse for skipping them. You’ll be out of your element in the water, after all.

Ah, sir. Have you seen Moddey? Apparently she’s never been in the water before, so I thought it would be best to teach her how to swim...but any moment I try to get her under the water, she ends up running away... I do hope she can overcome this predicament...
Sir... I’ve heard this entire stretch of land belongs to Primavera, but is that true? I did have the impression she was a lady of prestige...but certainly not to this extent...
Fatigue’s written all over your face, sir. Is it from accompanying the children? Their energy can indeed keep one’s hands full. Take this opportunity to rest. I’ll see to the children in your stead.

Pardon me, sir, but...are you fine being here with me? Surely, there must be others you would rather spend time with... I see... No, it’s nothing. I just never thought there’d come a day where you and I could relax and just listen to the sound of the wind... Hehe. You’ve given me a memory I’ll always treasure.

So, today’s your birthday. Ah, yes—supposedly there’s a cafe up ahead with a view of the whole lake. Its beautiful sunset makes lovers from far and wide see it as a sacred place, and any two who go together are bound to get marr...ah... Th-That wasn’t my intention. My apologies.

This outfit, sir? I bought it from Richesse. If I’m not mistaken, it’s called a “swimsuit,” and can be used for underwater operations... If you’re interested in one, I recommend seeing Richesse. She had a wide selection to choose from.
Ah, sir...here you are. Um... If you have a moment, why don’t we relax and have a chat? We should take it easy now before this chance passes us by...

Is there anything you have trouble dealing with, sir? There’s nothing like that for me, per se, but there are things I must conquer. Flames, the stench of gunpowder... All these things, I must eventually overcome. After all, my mother doesn’t wish for me to just cry and do nothing.

You said we came here to rejuvenate our strength, but are you getting proper rest, sir? We need to spend times like this wisely on ourselves. Don’t simply idle about—rest until you feel completely refreshed. Even my drowsy commanding officer often said refreshing oneself is important work.

Moddey ran away again. What exactly am I doing wrong? I’ve even tried adopting the soft, gentle tone Valeriede uses when speaking to Nina, like, “See, there’s nothing to be scared about. Come on now.” ...Hm? This is how Valeriede always speaks to Nina.

Once we finish our vacation, our fight will resume. Does that worry me? Not in the slightest... If I were alone, the illusions of my past would likely still be haunting me...but now I have comrades who I must protect. I’ll show you I can grow even stronger, so that one day, I can protect you too...
I may have overcome my trauma...but this new me still has plenty of growing up to do.

Aversions and shortcomings—no one understands them better than I do. It certainly would be upsetting if someone else lectured me about what to do about mine...just like what I did to Moddey... I owe her an apology...
I thought I’d made Moddey angry with me, but apparently I was reading everything the wrong way. Well, it’s true that I offended her to some extent...but I also caused you to worry. Forgive me.

For my first time taking charge of others, I barely kept myself together... The experience has made me more sympathetic towards the hardships you face. It must’ve been hard for my commanding officer too. It truly was trying... One became lost again, and again, and... Huh? She’s a special case?

A witch’s power comes from the heart. There are memories that shackle me... My mother vanishing into the flames, the screams of souls being burned alive... The moment I decided to bear those shackles and move forward, a new power awakened within me... With this power, I know I can protect my comrades, and you.
I’m the one to blame... Forgive me.
Keep your hands off my comrades!
An attack like that won’t work on me anymore!
Nnrrggh... Moddey feels kinda... C-Can you please not stare at me?!
Ah!! Finally! Just where in the world have you been, m’lord?! I’ve been here putting up with all this embarrassment, waiting to get going, so I expect you to show up too, okay?!

Nnrrgh... Why does this swimsuit gotta be so darn tiny...? It’s practically underwear...! Huh? I look cute in it? Wh-What the heck?! Of all the things you could’ve said, m’lord... You’re really asking for it!

Why are you letting me borrow your coat, m’lord? So I don’t feel embarrassed? Oh, th-thank you... Nnrrgh... It’s me who should be taking care of you though... Hmph. Just you wait, m’lord. Next time, I’m gonna take care of you even more!

Am I getting magic power from the summer, or something? I feel being adventurous with my outfit lets me say things I’d normally be too embarrassed to say... To tell you the truth, my ever so kind and gentle lord, I like you... Hehehe! Oh, the look on your face! Betcha believed me, didn’t ’cha?

Aren’t you hot, m’lord? Here, I got you a cold drink and a towel. If there’s anything else you want... You wanna take a nap? I knew you were gonna say that, so I also made sure to have a parasol and beach chair ready for you. And, I’ll even throw in a snuggle with yours truly if you want. Hehehe!

You know how a witch’s power comes from the heart? Well, if their heart goes through emotional changes, their power and soul will be affected. That means, if their heart is crushed by negative emotions, their power will distort, and cause the witch to rage out of control. Betcha didn’t know that!

Happy birthday, m’lord! Moddey here’s gonna give you a special gift just for today. You can look at me in my swimsuit as much as you like! Whatcha say, you lucky guy? ...W-Wait. You really are... Uuu, on second thought, stop looking!!

Since long ago, waterfronts were places lost spirits could easily find their way to. That probably explains the fog. Lost spirits feel so much pain from longing to see someone... Maybe that’s why they’ve always flocked to loud, crowded places.
One time I slipped and fell into a river, but Laila was the first to jump in and save me. She was such a good girl, always by my side, always protecting me.

It’s. So. HOOOT! Ugh, I can’t take this anymore! This heat’s gonna melt my ears and tail right off...! I’m sure a dip in the water will make the pain go away...but it’s so scary... M’lord...you gotta do something...!

How can everyone walk outside in those shameless outfits like it’s nothing...?! Sabrina’s wearing a swimsuit, Hathor’s outfit basically is one, and Belle’s practically naked...! Am I the weirdo for feeling embarrassed...?

Since I’m always doing my best, you want to take care of me anytime I’m having a bad day? Are you sure? Actually, ever since Dad and Laila passed away, every day’s been...gotcha! Didya think I was crying? Joke’s on you! Hehehe. ...But, when I really am feeling tired, I might just take you up on that offer.

A gravekeeper’s job is to ensure the departed are resting peacefully in their graves. But, it’s also nice to make them smile while they’re still with us, right? The only gravekeeper who can take care of someone from the cradle to the grave is me, after all. So, m’lord, want me to take care of ya until it’s your time to go?
A long time ago, I almost drowned in a river...so me and water still kiiinda don’t get along... Aha...
Hmph! ...I-I can do the doggy paddle, y’know... Laila taught me how...
This floaty ring is the best thing ever! Now, I’ll be safe and sound even if I can’t swim... Huh? Ah! Don’t let go! I’m still practicing!
Huh? There’s something in the lake! What in the world is that?! It’s like a small, floaty umbrella! I’ve never seen anything so cool!

Dan-da-dan~! Now I can swim all by myself. I got my floaty ring, and I know Laila’s always watching over me, so I know I’ll be A-okay. Come to think of it, can you swim, m’lord? If you ask nicely, Moddey here might just be able to teach you.

Thank you, m’lord. We had so much fun playing in the water together, I can barely remember I was even scared of it. To show my appreciation, I’ll be sure to take care of you a whooole lot more from now on, okay? Hehehe!
Hah hah~! Piece of cake! ...Huh? N-No! Anything but water... Anything!!
Oh nooo... There’s a hole in my floaty ring...!

Memo: CharacterProfileMB

Text:
"الغدر
غناء ريونوس

أشعر مثل حورية تذوب بين موج البحر
لطالما بقيت وحدها، لتختفي دون وجود أي أثر لها
وعود كادت تقع في طي النسيان
هل جميعنا يعاني من أجل النجاة

وراء ابتساماتنا التي نجبر على رسمها على وجوهنا
كل منا لديه ما يتمناه
ولكن، دائمًا ما نقتل مشاعرنا في أعماق أنفسنا
واحدة تلو أخرى

لن أتوقف—يجب أن أمضي قدمًا
حتى يلوح الشفق في آفاق السماء

لن أستطيع البوح بمشاعري
فما أقدر عليه هو كبتها في قلبي
ولكن مرة أخرى، مع مرور قليل من الوقت
قلبي سوف يشفي هذه الجروح
أرجوك، أخبرني لماذا...
لماذا تخليت عني؟

سيرت وحدي تحت السماء الملبدة بالغيوم
وأنا أبحث عنك في كل مكان
ثم، أدركت أنني في نفس المكان
محاصرة دون مكان يمكنني الذهاب إليه

ها أنا ذا، أعاني من إحراج شديد
لكن، يبدو أنه لن يراني أحد على أية حال

تبتعد عني
أجزاء من أحلام لم أعد أحلم بها
بسبب مطاردتي لها
جسدي ملوث بأكاذيب
أنا آسف... سامحني

دموعي تلمع في المرآة
جسدي على وشك الانهيار، وقلبي أصبح محطَّمًا
لكن، ما زلت أريد أن يأخذني أحدهم
لذا لم أشغل بالي بأمور كهذه، وانتظرت بهدوء
ولكن حتى ذلك الحين، كنت أدرك منذ البداية
إشارات تدل على أنك الخائن

عاجزة عن البوح بمشاعري
فما أقدر عليه هو كبتها في قلبي
ولكن مع مرور الوقت
سيشفي قلبي هذه الجروح
أرجوك، أخبرني لماذا...
لماذا تخليت عني؟ "

Backstabber

I feel like a mermaid that
is melting in the waves
I faded away from here
Where you left me
I feel like a missing map
that’s floating in the waves
You will forget it

Now I’m like a mermaid who
has lost all her laughter
Then I faded away
But I’m dreaming
And I killed my heart so that
I won’t want anything
One by one by one

Don’t stop, I can’t stop
I have to move forward
Before the twilight overtakes me

I couldn’t tell you anything
Couldn’t open my mind
I closed up and shut down
I want to tell you everything
Want to open my mind
Now our time’s up, breakdown
Why did you go?
Why did you go?
Why did you leave the mermaid?

I feel like a mermaid who’s
swimming in cloudy sky
I’m looking for your back
that I can’t find
I feel like a mermaid who
can’t move from the same place
I’m stuck here to you

Crouching down and down
No one’s looking at me
Someone else’s eyes overtake me

Couldn’t be with you forever
Couldn’t follow my dream
I closed up and shut down
I didn’t want to lie to you
Want to say sorry
Now our time’s up, breakdown
Why did you go?
Why did you go?
Why did you leave the mermaid?

I know my body has no energy
I know my heart is torn to pieces
I want you to hug me, but I want you to admit
Your heart was growing away from me, but
I was always trying to forget it
I loved you so much, but you only sold me out

I couldn’t tell you anything
Couldn’t open my mind
I closed up and shut down
I want to tell you everything
Want to open my mind
Now our time’s up, breakdown
Why did you go?
Why did you go?
Why did you leave the mermaid?

"خادمة متدربة تعمل في منزل الدوق تحلم بأن تصبح خادمة ماهرة. بعدما طُردت مونيكا من منازل عديدة لكونها ساحرة، استقبلها الدوق في منزله. إنها فتاة هادئة ومتحفظة تكره القتال، ولكنها دائمًا تبذل قصارى جهدها."

البريق الدائم
غناء دوكو

وداعًا لغروب الشمس
فهناك صوت وحيد يردد أصداء نابضة بالحياة في ذهني
منذ زمن بعيد، هنا وحتى هذه اللحظة
دعوات الناس تتردد
بألحان تمس القلب

في الشوارع المليئة بالمطر، أرقص وأتمايل من اليمين إلى اليسار
مع قلبي الحزين
وفي هذه اللحظة، أتمنى وجودك هنا؛
لتبتسم معي

انتظرت شروق الشمس، وأنا أتطلع إلى جدول التقويم
فغدًا هو اليوم الذي سأتوقف فيه عن البكاء
سألت نفسي مرارًا وتكرارًا
"إن كان بإمكاني أن أكون حرة، فهل سأجد من ينقذني؟"

وداعًا
رغم أن قلبي يتوق للبقاء، ولكن على أن أمضي قدمًا
فهذه الرحلة المستمرة ستأخذني
إلى ضوء القمر

في كل مرة أرمش فيها
يتغير العالم من حولي—يجعلني أشعر بالدوار
مع مرور الوقت
سنصبح مثل فقاعات المياه في مهب الرياح

من بين الغيوم الرمادية
ينبعث نور من السماء الزرقاء
إنه ضوء الشمس الذي يغمر الغرفة
لقد رأيت هذا المشهد من قبل

انتظرت شروق الشمس، مختبئة في ظلمة الليل
عندما غمرتني مخاوفي المتزايدة
في قلبي، يلمع بريق كهرماني من الماضي البعيد
يشع بضوء مشرق

قلت لنفسي في الحلم
"ليس هناك ما أخشاه"
أنسج جميع أحلامي معًا،
لكن حان الوقت للعودة
إلى حيث أعيش

ودعت أيامي التي مضت
سأبدأ السير في الدرب من جديد
أمسك بيدك
فرحلتنا هي التي تقربنا من بعضنا البعض
دائمًا، دائمًا

تسقط براعم الزهور وترقص
تحت ضوء القمر
تحت ضوء القمر

Everglow

Saying goodbye to the sunset
Your sad melody echoes through the darkest sky
Long, long ago, here now, and gone
People have lived, prayed, and sang a song
with their fragile memories

The rain won’t stop falling
Drizzling, blurred streets
My heart is soaking too
Can’t tell how much I wish you were here
Wanna laugh with you right now

Waiting for sunrise
All day, you’re on my mind
I don’t know what to do
Tomorrow I won’t be crying
I’m talking to myself again and again
If I’m free, will I be saved?

Now is the time to say goodbye
I must move forward
Knowing that I’m not ready for it
Let me believe that you’ll be there
Let’s go out to see the moonlight with me

Every time I blink, I see a new sight
It makes me feel dizzy
We will all disappear someday
Like the bubble blown away

Through the clouds, I see the sky
It’s so blue, I felt a beauty
Sunlight shines into the room
I’m sure I’ve seen this view before

Waiting for sunrise
My fear never goes away
And still overflows
That’s why I hid in the night
The moments of precious memories in my heart
appear in my dream

I’m always dreaming in my dream
I’m talking to myself
“Oh dear, there’s nothing to fear”
Still looking for a place where we live
I’ve got to get back
Shiny light pulls my hand and leads me

Now is the time to say goodbye
I am moving forward
with the momentum of hope
Hold hands with you, I’ll be okay
In this journey, we are still bonding
our strength to be strong
Forevermore, forevermore

Petals of wish pour down on us
Come with me, let’s go to see the moonlight
Come with me, let’s go to see the moonlight

"ابنة وحيدة لعائلة نبيلة سابقة. إنها ذكية ولطيفة بقدر ما هي جادة وصارمة. تعتبر إيليا ساحرة استثنائية، حيث ولدت بقوة مميزة ليست لدى غيرها من الساحرات. ومع ذلك، ما زالت طبيعتها الحقيقية يكتنفها الغموض."

"الشفق
أغنية بصوت هاكوبي

أسحب جسدي الثقيل مثل الرصاص
أسير دون هدف عبر طرقات المدينة قبل بزوغ الفجر
لطالما انهمرت دموعي قبل أن تجف منذ زمن بعيد
لتترك قلبي خاليًا

أتمنى لو كان بإمكاني العيش
دون معرفة أي شيء
لو أشرقت الشمس مرة أخرى يومًا ما

Twilight

I’m walking in the early morning
Carrying emptiness, alone
The hazy fuzzy shadow is following
No one comforts me

My overflowing hope has already withered away
Only an empty heart remained here
It’s so quiet here

I wish I could erase my memories
Just keep it all from my mind
Sometimes I can’t remember, how do I breathe?
But it’s okay, I’ll find a way to smile

Whenever you were nice to me
Whenever you made me smile
I was so afraid of losing those precious moments
You always gave me unconditional love,
but I denied
I was running blind in darkness,
and trying to forget

I wish I could erase my memories
Of all the people I have met
Am I wrong to think
that your love isn’t worth believin’?
Can anyone fix my broken feelings?

I’ve lost the will to live, but I’m afraid of dying
I’m on my own in this cold, empty night
And still here breathing
Even the brightest light feels like a trap offered by
A day shadow, and I cannot believe it
Cannot take it

I was sure I could do anything
Never thought there were things to fear
Wherever I am, wherever you are
I was sure I would have
a bright n’ shiny cheerful life
Now it’s too late to know
what your words mean to me
I knew that my heart was
a lonely, withered, wilted flower
Ah, I feel a warm wind tonight

I’ve lost the will to live, but I’m afraid of dying
I’m on my own in this cold, empty night
I’m still here breathing
And I’m okay with that, even you’re not here
A gleam of light is coming from the sky

No matter how I spend my days
I’ve still got room left to grow
I won’t deny myself anymore
Make me feel like me
Even the brightest light
feels like a trap offered by
A dark shadow, but now I can believe
I’m reaching for the sky
I’m reaching for the sky
I’m reaching for the sky
I’m reaching for my dreams

Believe

Even if I knew everything there was
Everything that made you who you are
I don’t believe I could keep my heart quiet
Although I’ll keep on trying,
I can’t have what I want

Wish my fears were easily removed
Like the dust that clings to my old boots
I’m haunted by all that I’ve wrought
I stumble and can’t find a way back up

I feel another wave breaking
It drags back up the distant past
Wishes forgotten so long ago
Come back to me and linger in my heart

Let me stay in the night
The cusp of a true dream
I dread the morning
Encroaching rays of light
Far away

Shelter me from the rain
Your pain is your true gift
It comes with kindness
Distorted but it’s true
Believe in your past and darkness

Even though there’s danger up ahead
I see the moon and stars that light my way
Your beating heart’s like a guardian’s shadow
It’s always been right there against my back

I feel another temptation
It draws me in with pretty lies
Desires I’ve managed to bury deep
Come back to me and whisper in my sleep

Let me stayin my dreams
Your arms holding me tight
Like this forever
At least until my tears fly away
Believe in me

Shelter me from the rain
Your pain is your true gift
It comes with kindness
Distorted but it’s true
Believe in your past and darkness

My Stuffed Bear

Where are you now?
Can you hear me calling out?
I will always be right here
Forever

You’re not alone
I’ll hold you close and not let go
My bear, we’ll make it through

Memories of loving you
will never fade to white

as I think about your smile
My bear, no need to worry

Hold to the thought of you and me,
me and you, we’ll get through
Wait for me, I’ll be there,
just you wait and you’ll see

And from the cold that
keeps on surrounding you
I’ll help you to break through
Forever me and you

And shatter all the frozen glass

Memories of loving you
will never fade to white

as I think about your smile
My bear, no need to worry

Don’t say goodbye to you and me,
me and you, we’ll get through
Wait for me, I’ll be there,
just you wait and you’ll see
I will be there to save your heart from the dark

keeps on surrounding you
I’ll help you to break through
Forever me and you

that I am here

Hold to the memories of you and me,
me and you, we’ll get through

just you wait and you’ll see

Outcry

Swallow my sorrow
My heart holds a shadow
But life must go on
Give me light, make me strong
I’m still looking for...

Nobody knows I am here
This corner of the world
Walking a lonely road alone

I can see my burden coming everyday

Swallow my sorrow

All I remember you were always by my side

Swallow my sorrow

My Treasure

Deep inside of me there lives a scared little child
I push away the past and try to bury her
Underneath the shelter of the sky far above
We’re all the same
Small inside

Grasping for connection, reaching air, not a soul
Those moments spent alone
pile up like single bricks
Bit by bit, making you
that much more scared inside
We all have our own dark starless nights here

How do I become the girl who laughs
during the darkest nights alone?
Can I become that warrior?

Somewhere out in the world, it’s waiting for you
It’s the one true thing you’ve lost
But to find it again you will face all your fears,
they’re still intense
There’s battles up ahead, they’re waiting for you
You will be knocked down,
but keep on charging through
Even if my love turns into endless pain
And dries up all the tears I haven’t shed
I will be that warrior

How do I find someone to share in
the life I’ve always dreamt alone?
Can I forgive myself at last?

There’s danger up ahead, it’s waiting for you
And you’re truly terrified
But you’ll find it inside,
that strong voice that says go,
it’s always there
You’ll be battered and bruised, again and again
You will be knocked down,
but keep on charging through
Even if the fight goes on for endless years
And wrecks my body into shattered bones
I will be that warrior

The little promises you broke
That were scattered wide and far
Even as they’re trampled, crushed into bits
Pick them up and gently
Whispering your truth
You can make them whole again
Until they glow like nighttime stars,
lighting your way

I wish upon the stars, just for some strength
So that I can carry on

Somewhere out in the world, it’s waiting for you
It’s the one true thing you’ve lost
But to find it again you will face all your fears,
keep following those stars
There’s battles up ahead, they’re waiting for you
You will be knocked down,
but keep on charging through
Even as my love turns into endless pain
And the battle wounds turn into deep scars
I know that I won’t have regrets
Rushing into the eye of the storm
I’ve become that warrior

"فتاة تتوق لمَن يهتم ويعتني بها، ولكنها تضع أولويات أختها الصغرى سيربروس قبل رغباتها الشخصية. تتطلع فينرير لتعزيز قوتها للتغلب على مأساة ماضية حيث فشلت في حماية شقيقتها. ومع ذلك في أعماق فنرير يوجد فتاة خجولة تريد مَن يحنو عليها عندما تبكي."

"علم
غناء واكانا

بينما أشق طريقي عبر الشوارع المليئة بالغبار

لن يستطيع أحد أن يسرقها مني

الناس في ذكرياتي لن تتغير أبدًا

تتردد أغنيتنا عاليًا في السماء

"فتاة تعهدت بحماية صديقتها، فورتينا، ولكن قامت قائدة الكنيسة بتضليلها لتؤذي صديقتها. لم تعد فلورنسا هي ذاتها، حيث أصبحت المعلمة الكبرى لفرسان لونجينوس. ومع ذلك، هي ليست فارسة—هي مجرد عضو في ميليشيا قريتها. ارتباطها بفورتينا وثيق—فقد بُني على ثقة ليس لها نهاية."

لن أسمح لفورتينا بأن تذرف دمعة أخرى.
لن يحدث ذلك مرة أخرى.

No stopping this motion

how it seems so long ago

Even though I understand
nothing is promised in this life

Straight Ahead

On my way to the usual routine
Through these meadows and gardens so green
Off to a distant part of the town
Where I hustle and grind till the break of day

Then I heard you call but I’m mountains away
Asking me for help but I’m tied up these days
So I turned away and instead
I walked straight ahead

Now I lay to sleep at night
My eyes closed, but I
still see your bittersweet smile
Looking at me and haunting my dreams
Now it’s just too late
All of my thoughts of guilt and regret
I can’t escape

Have I made the right choice?
Should I feel this way?
Questioning...
If I went out of my way and helped you,
would have been a different ending?

Now I spend my days trying to handle the pain
With nobody else here but myself to blame
Day by day, I work with a broken heart I can’t mend

Now I try to distract myself
I’m spending all my time
working until I get tired
Is this something that I have to do
the rest of my days
To forget my tormented thoughts
and get over you?

Now I lay to sleep at night
My eyes closed, but I
still see your bittersweet smile
Looking at me and haunting my dreams
Now it’s just too late
All of my thoughts of guilt and regret
I can’t escape

Horns

This growing feeling inside of me
Depleted and left to harden, dry
As the horns endlessly grow and grow
When liars are pardoned like honest living men

Now how can I get you to share a smile?
Even just a little glimmer of delight
Tell me where can I find
what I’ve been looking for
Discovering the path to seek what I desire

My caress is gentle and mild
Will stroke it away just to open one more wound

Everybody is naive
Fragile flower wilts away
With its petals frozen patiently
Waiting for a dream

And before it disappears out of sight
As ice white as sugar crystalize
Like a sharp-edged blade that pierces the soul
From harmless and round
to a spear that’s full of might

How can I spark the laughter waiting in my heart?
Even just a fleeting moment one more time
If I only could just let go and let it out
How easy could it be, I struggle to believe

In the end, it’s all that remains
A haunting past that I want to disappear

Sky so wide infinitely
Hiding stars are out of sight
As I wrap my arms around myself
Trembling through the night

This growing feeling inside of me
Depleted and left to harden, dry
As the horns endlessly grow and grow
When liars are pardoned like honest living men

Rage

Haven’t got friends, haven’t got goals,
only have this unending fight
It never ends ‘till I die,
that’s why I’m wandering
Meaningless fights, meaningless nights,
only have these endless nights
That’s what I want, that thing will do,
whatever, I’m outta here

It sounds too good, it can’t be true,
it’s just a trick, a fleeting glimpse
Trick of the light, trick of the dark,
it’s not real, no treasure here
That crazy spark, that flash of pain,
where it ends up nobody knows
You think you’ve got something to win,
you stupid kid, don’t go there

Every time a storm cloud splits the sky
Fighting, clawing like angry beasts
Memories that don’t find their way
The colors fading out
like those old washed-up bones

Spoken words that will slither wither into lies
Someone made them sweeter
and tasting of hope
Leaving truth on the outside to stand on its own
Washed out and colored like grim darkened ash

Spouting lies that sound sweeter
than truth ever will
It’s so easy to hold you and whisper in your ear
Reaching for that one something that I never had
‘Cause I sense already that you’re leaving here
Why is it you’re not saying, but can’t deny

Always with me, never escape,
always have this undying pain
It never fades, all these doubts,
that’s why I’m questioning
I don’t wear gloves, or armor up,
only need pain to carry on
Nothing to want, this life will do,
whatever gives hella thrill

Every time the church bell tolls for us
Ripping all our fragile dreams
Memories from so long ago
The shadows disappear
like those forgotten ghosts

Whispered words to carry you
just through the night
Someone named them answers
that became our truth
Selling off what we really
should hold fast and close
Deeper and not of the world that we see
We can’t know what is waiting beyond this view

Spoken words that will slither wither into lies
Someone made them sweeter
and tasting of hope
Leaving truth on the outside to stand on its own
Washed out and colored like grim darkened ash

Spouting lies that sound sweeter
than truth ever will
It’s so easy to hold you and whisper in your ear

‘Cause I sense already that you’re leaving here

هذا العالم القذر يثير اشمئزازي. ومع ذلك...

The Road Home to You

Been traveling across the seas
Have journeyed new worlds near and far
This voyage made me realize
That people aspire for the same things in life
I wonder as I’m wandering
When this storm will pass us by
Been living in these endless nights
Awaiting to see the sun rise

I’ve seen the breath-taking sights
I’ve witnessed terrible fights
Each day, a different highlight
But my mind is still stuck on you
The heart I left behind

Many more days to come
That I live my days away from you
But please do know
my heart is longing for you day by day
Answer me, hear my call
In my dreams, I dance with you
Cannot wait until I finally find my way back
To you

Wherever this path may lead
I pray that the stars will guide me
In this road full of uncertainty
Faith and hope is what I’m clinging to
Please bestow ample strength upon me

Must not fall
Must not fall
Trust that miracles are coming true
Must stand up and go on
to yearn a lifetime with you
Wait for me, I’ll be home
I will share my victory
Cannot wait until I finally find my way back

Wait for me, I’ll be home
I will conquer fear and wipe my tears
Oblivious ‘bout tomorrow,
yet my courage shines through
Answer me, hear my call
Must believe that dreams come true
Cannot wait until I finally find my way back
To you

أقف دون حراك للحظة ليخيم الصمت حياتي

لمرة أخرى، فقط لمرة أخرى

ولكن السماء التي تذكرتها ذات مرة، أصبحت

إلى أن تغرق في سباتي
تتمايل وتتمايل—بقايا الزهور الثابتة
في منزل لا يمكنني العودة إليه أبدًا

آه، إذا بحثت في قلبي

لن يطيب مع الوقت

Traces of Flowers

I was slowly walking down the street
along with you
You touched my hair gently
I felt like I’ve seen this view before
Perhaps it was a dream?
It was like déjà vu

Tell me how do I get to your warmth?
The wind’s smell tells me of the time of year
The path where I used to get lost
Reminds me of those days
I’m still longing for your sweet smile

There’s something I want to forget
Petals of memories
are floating and gently wash away
Raindrops falling on me
It seems to never stop
Until you come and find my whereabouts
Fluttering, fluttering petals of dream
falling from the sky
Sunlight touches my cheeks

I’m standing here now, quiet, alone
The bustle’s far away
I feel like left behind
Can you find me here in no man’s land?
I’m waiting for so long
Tell me where you are now

Just one more time, take me back there
The wind’s smell tells me of the time of year
That sky was so blue, it was too bright for me
I’m just longing for your sweet smile

My hazy wish flies far away
It’s slowly melting
and flowing with the sound of rain
I’m sleeping all alone
Still dreaming of you
I wake up and realize you’re not here
Fluttering, fluttering petals of dream
falling from the sky
I’m missing of those days

If I open my heart
And find a wishing star, I’ll reach my destiny
Forever and ever, wherever you are
The stars will guide me
Take me to you

There’s something I want to forget
Petals of memories
are floating and gently wash away
Raindrops falling on me
It seems to never stop
Until you come and find my whereabouts
Fluttering, fluttering petals of dream
falling from the sky
Sunlight touches my cheeks

Drowsiness

A transparent turret
So entangled, what an ignorant heart
Woe stays and love turn into ashes
And the dreams, they have rusted
All the blood stains
Hesitating pain
Where is my destination? Cry

’Cause I could die in vain
Oh, just a fool to be derided
Soul cries, the night
Bringing me flashback
Comeback, drawback, blackout
There’s no turning back

So kill ’em now
The tears inside
I’ll kill ’em now
The tears inside
I’ll keep you safe

Symptoms undetected
There is nothing that is truly just
Taste of lies on my tongue like a dagger
And the thirst always lingers
Oh, how fragile can this heart be
Now, even hatred is a form of want

Afraid it’ll all collapse
How will I know when they all start spilling?
I can’t go back
Already too late, the end
Who wins? Disgrace
There’s no turning back

Reveal it now
The fools we are
It never ends
So kill ’em now

Let it tear my heart open
If it was only just a useless, worthless pain
I could make it end if I just fall asleep
I can’t even say I’m sorry
What a coward, what a hopeless case I am
And I know I’ll never be someone like you

So kill ’em now
The tears inside
I’ll kill ’em now
The tears inside
I’ll keep you safe

"فتاة من قرية على حدود غاليا-أدريا، وصديقة رين، وسكولد، وبريسيلا منذ الطفولة. تسير على خطى والدها لتصير جندية، ولكنها اكتشفت سرًا بالصدفة يدمر قريتها. زارا جندية قليلة الحديث، ولكن في أعماقها فتاة لطيفة تعتز بأصدقائها."

Lament

You’re a flower, always healing me
When you smile,
sunlight comes through the leaves
You make me think about the meaning of love
So my heart belongs to you

I was left behind, empty on the inside
The sky is so clear and blue
It reminds me of those days

Forever and ever, forever and ever
Your sunny smile shines in my memories
Time waits for no one, I will move forward
Even if I can only see my shadow
This voyage is taking me to you
I see your smile in the sky, it leads me to you

Every night I wait for sunrise
Losing hope for tomorrow, I’m all alone
You make me think about the meaning of life
I remember the warmth of your hands

Listen to my voice, just release all fears
The sky is so clear and blue
I wanna be your sunshine

I’ll find out where you are
Wait for me, I’ll be there
You’ve taught me how to feel joy and love
There are times when I just
want to feel your embrace
All those years,
I’ve longed to hold you in my arms
This voyage is taking me to you
Keep tight my hopes,
my heart is always with you

The wind blows, pushes me forward
I’m wishing on a star to follow where you are
I’ll never forget the day you and I met
I smell the scent of the breeze, just like that day

Forever and ever, forever and ever
Your sunny smile shines in my memories
Time waits for no one, I will move forward
Even if I can only see my shadow
This voyage is taking me to you
I see your smile in the sky, it leads me to you
Clouds part ways
I see rays of hope shining through
Let the flower of joy bloom again and again

Orion Shining Above the Skies at Noon

Woke up today with a memory
Something I picture so vividly
Dancing and laughing all night
in paradise, you and me

Then realized it was just a dream
Something impossible so it seems
How in the world would a guy like you
fall for someone like me?

Might it be because you rescued me unavoidably?
Or you’re undeniably just mesmerizing?
Boy, my heart skips a beat for you

I should stop myself from
yearning this charming fantasy
That a sweet life of you and me is a possibility
Stop believing this impossible dream
is coming true
Like seeing Orion
shining above the skies at noon

How could I push these feelings away
When I get to see you every day
Working together as we
would share the same goals in this journey

Would it be too much to ask
for a country girl like me?
Have an incidental chance to win you over
Now, secretly, I’m wishing for you

Should I stop myself from
yearning this charming fantasy?
Somehow, I’m feeling that you and me
can become reality
Now that we’ve become close,
I should not close my doors again and again
‘Cause who knows?
I might get the impossible possibility

Have I found the signs
of finally enchanting you?
When you look at me,
do you see me the way I see you?
Or am I just stuck in another illusion?
I’m blinded by delusion
On my own

Must believe that I have
given a little spark of joy
And hope that it will bring us together
forever through and through
But if somehow it’s not
what I imagined it to be
I’m accepting the heartbreak
knowing the possibilities

I won’t stop myself from
yearning this charming fantasy
To find my happiness in this world
full of great uncertainties
Shadows surround the sun
as its eclipsed by the full moon, and now
I might see the Orion
shining above the skies at noon

Fly Away

It’ll never disappear
Unbridled through the atmosphere
Like a treasure shining, brightly glimmering
The magic of a healing dream

From a garden’s comfort place,
blossom out and seek a new day
Have the courage to go step by step
Take it slow, forge ahead

Watch the wings of the birds in the sky
They travel far and they travel so high
Just like the winds that rise, they soar by

Fly away like falling starlight
Release all your wishes out to the night
Hold on tight, no need to hesitate
To be free
Follow a dream that never will fade
Let’s open the door, embrace the new day
Say hello, let’s travel to tomorrow
The sky never ends up above, so infinite
I can see it clearly...
We were meant to wander free

Every single tear I cry
I know is true compassion’s price
I’m on my way to be who I wanna be
Though I’m not perfect or complete

Believe and you’ll achieve
But this ain’t a smooth fairy tale
Gave my heart out but at times I’m lost
and I’m ready to break

Why keep trying, I always get stuck
They tell me “why don’t you just give it up?”
But I won’t give in, no, I’ll rise up

So never give up, through rain or lightning
I’m never alone, I won’t stop fighting
I am strong, and I am not afraid
Bravely open the map, a new adventure
Open my heart, I won’t surrender
Say hello, step into a brand new world
I know that I’m ready to go the extra mile
If you’re beside me

Cast away the life you’ve known,
the traditions you were told
No hesitation
The courage that you’ve gained
The winds of change will guide you boldly
once again

Fly away like falling starlight
Release all your wishes out to the night
Hold on tight, no need to hesitate
To be free
Follow a dream that never will fade
Let’s open the door, embrace the new day
Say hello, let’s travel to tomorrow
The sky never ends up above, so infinite
I can see it clearly...
We were meant to wander free

Blue Rose

Headfirst, I’m falling deep into the void
Next moment, I wake from a dream
The start of a journey that leads to the end
Every step takes me further from peace

When all the pain that’s been lost on the way
Is found and collected again
Oh please, won’t you let me
take your hand in mine
And together we’ll dance, you and I

Right by the window,
a flower blooms wishing for you
Blessing you and the story you choose
And every night,
every dream that it whispers to me
Even now I remember them all

Pale blue and dusky, it glows in the dark
A petal that rests on the floor
No matter how fragile our wishes may seem
Keep holding on, don’t let them go

There’s only one thing that I ask of you
One promise I pray that you’ll keep
Whenever a thought of me crosses your mind
May it bring you a smile every time

All of the hearts running dry
every time that they touch
Hurt each other like flowers with thorns
With every sigh,
every teardrop that falls to the ground
Trying to cover the pain that’s inside

Right by the window,
a flower blooms wishing for you
Blessing you and the story you choose
And every night,
every dream that it whispers to me
Even now I remember them all

Wish I could hold you,
just one moment in time
Even though you’re still so far away
Someday somewhere,
I believe that I’ll see you again
So I’ll wait till the morning arrives

Trip on Planet Confuzzled

My head is spinning ‘round and ‘round
Traveling around in circles
Left, right, right, left
I don’t know which way to go

But maybe if I pick this road
Or maybe if I go the other
Someone tell me
Where to go, for I don’t know

I can see the sun
How far I’ll go, I’ll never know
But in your eyes I feel the warmth of love inside
Will happiness never arrive?
Iam lost, so can you find me?

Maybe you can be my melody
Sing to me a song of hopeful stars
Maybe you can be my remedy
We will never be apart
Hold on to me tight and don’t let go
Grab on to my hand and lead me home
Never-ending roads and journeys
But will I ever know?

Searching for the path, this road I roam
I’ll be there soon
My dear home, please wait for me

I’m tired of all these twists and turns
Where do I go? I swear that I’ve been here before
My lost heart is leading me forward
Maybe there, you’ll be waiting for me
Maybe yet, you could be my home

Maybe you can be my melody
Sing to me a song of hopeful stars
Maybe you can be my remedy
We will never be apart
Hold on to me tight and don’t let go
Grab on to my hand and lead me home
Never-ending roads and journeys
But will I ever know?

Searching for the path, this road I roam
I’ll be there soon
My dear home, please wait for me

To the Most Beautiful Miracle of All

Used to be so numb,
always focused on my own desires
So consumed I grind
and experiment on things that I don’t know
Looking at these half empty bottles
trying to figure out what’s wrong
Another failed attempt
I’ll just start once more

I get scrutinized,
they tell me that I am wasting my life
But to my defense,
I’d lose ten to save a hundred more
And I justify
that I’m doing the whole world a simple favor
At least that’s what I thought day to day
Until the moment that you laid
your bright eyes on me

I never believed in miracles
Not until the day that I looked at you
Your tiny hands that hold me tight
gave a brand-new meaning to my life now
I know that we live in borrowed time
Cherish every fleeting moment with you
Unexpected now
Who knew I could love?
‘Till now since I found you, my miracle

Now I’m thinking of
ways that I have never thought before
Trying to bargain with
something that is out of my control
Now I’m asking why?
Why a precious soul like you could be so fragile?
There must be something that I can do
To make you live a life that’s filled
with love and joy

Hush now darling, don’t you cry
Sorry that I can’t stay by your side
It breaks my heart to leave you behind
But my life I have to sacrifice
I must give myself away to save you
Please don’t think that I would want to leave you
You’ll be in my heart
I wish to the stars
Hope you understand
I’ll trade my life for you

La la lala La lala La la lala La la lala
Love you will all of my life ‘till the end
La la lala La lala La la lala La la lala
Hope that you’ll remember me in your dreams

Poco A Poco

The evening wind blows as I walk alone
Took a little time to reflect and breathe
Away from the strain
Of pressure and of shame around me

It’s not easy for an outlaw like me
To prove I am more than worthy
Of authority to guide the path ahead

Then I saw you trying to hide
In tears you cry
But maybe there is something I can do
So I can help you

Sprinkle happiness
Each time I sing poco-a-poco
I can’t hold back, I can’t deny
This power to inspire
I’m about to show
the world that I deserve to be here
So if you’re lost and have nowhere else to go
Come and let me lead the way

Maybe I am not as strong as you think
But I know my way around the risky roads
To protect this tribe
I am willing to abandon it all

Sometimes I can be rough around the sides
Not my bread and butter, but I try
Trust my instincts that I will keep you safe

We may not make it as one
But we won’t stop
We know that on the other side
For sure, we will meet again

Dream of happiness
Each time you sing poco-a-poco
You must not hold back, must not deny
Your power deep inside
You may know that I
might not always be by your side
But still,we know we’ll conquer these obstacles
Come and let me lead the way

With me, you can depend and trust on
Break free from fear inside of your heart
Victory is possible
If we focus on the goal
And keep our faith from within

Fight for happiness
Each time we sing poco-a-poco
We won’t hold back, we won’t deny
This power multiplies
We are hand in hand
to fight for what we all believe in
Together we will triumph until the end
Come and let me lead the way

Crying Blue

See the water ripples
Without the wind, feeling the stillness
See the darkness of blue
Is it the color of the dawn never come?

Over there, you listen carefully
And close your eyes, then you know now
You can reach to get the feel of their desire, so

Drawing on a canvas in the night
To heal the heartaches layered
Faraway, forever, you will not forget
Struggle to the dream that we deserve
Scatter in the dark, the one beloved
Paint it in the hue of brilliance

Deep in the water of blueness
Thrown out the window,
a curse on a black pebble
There’s nothing we can do
It is the world sinking into oblivion

Over here, you listen to the sound
of the rain that never stops
You can read ‘bout the broken kingdom now
Showing their despair

Adoring and love, cannot resist
Far beyond the world of blackest dye
Someday, it will all be filled with light
One by one, day by day
Let this weight soak in hope
Embrace it warmly with Cherna

Drawing on a canvas in the night
To heal the heartaches layered
Faraway, forever, you won’t forget
Adoring and love, cannot resist
Our dreams in vain in this world
Paint it in the hue of brilliance

Oh, another night, I’m out, what’s new?

(Could I be in love with you somehow?)
I’m all in, there’s no turning back now
(I’m all in, there’s no turning back now)
Right now, my heart is pounding

Ahhwawa

Oh, your eyes they sparkle, oh, so bright

I have seen you in my dreams

But should I stop myself from falling?
(But should I stop myself from falling?)
Need to take good care of my feelings
(Need to take good care of my feelings)
‘Cause you might leave me in the morning
(‘Cause you might leave me in the morning)
Breaking my heart, shooting it
Bang bang bang bang, oh my God!

I’m a happy-go-lucky girl
Never bothered to
see all the sadness around in this world
